name: T-Rex Game (Web Version)
description:
A simple T-Rex run game made in Godot 3.1

  • Jump - W,  Spacebar and Up Arrow
  • Down - S and Down Arrow

On Android

  • Jump - Touch on botton
  • Down - Touch on top

Downlaod page

You can download this game in my second page: 
https://kalleby-santos.itch.io/t-rex-game
